title: Sweet chilli chicken pasta
ingredients: ['300g pasta', 'oil as needed', '1 onion, finely sliced', '1 red pepper, finely sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 small tin chopped tomatoes', '200 to 400ml sweet chilli sauce (to taste)', '3 dessertspoons creme fraiche', '150 to 300g cooked chicken, shredded']
